derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent. (as fingram): perhaps from French fin grain 'fine grain'. Compare with grogram and grosgrain

entry.def: Fingering is the method of using the most suitable finger to play each note when you are playing a musical instrument, especially the piano.

means.word_mean: 1. the placement of the fingers for playing different notes (or sequences of notes) on a musical instrument
